SELECT R.ROUTE_NUM, U.NAME, U.PROFILE, R.TITLE, R.STATE, R.PARTICIPANT_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(CU.USER_NUM) FROM CHATTING_USER CU WHERE CHATTING_NUM = ( SELECT CHATTING_NUM FROM CHATTING C WHERE C.ROUTE_NUM = R.ROUTE_NUM ) ) AS CURRENT_USER_COUNT, R.PICTURE, R.CREATE_DATE, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, R.CONTENT FROM ROUTE R LEFT JOIN USERS U ON (R.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM)
